content: of last row 1st armhole after row 5 6 4 chain 3 chain count as first double_crochet skip 3 sts 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3 double_crochet in the central double_crochet of the 5 double_crochet of last row chain skip 2 sts double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row chain skip 2 sts x repeat until the end of the row turn chain double_crochet chain 3dc 2ch 3dc 7 same stitch pattern as row 6 but make the 3dc 2 chain 3 double_crochet in the 2 chain gaps of last row 4 chain 3 chain count as first double_crochet skip sts to reach the next 2ch gap 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3dc in 2ch-gap of last round chain skip sts double_crochet in single double_crochet of last row chain skip sts repeat all around when you reach the end of this row join with 3rd beginning chain from now on we re crocheting in rounds join after row 7 with 3rd beginning chain 3dc 2ch 3dc in 2ch gaps chain double_crochet chain 8 17 4 chain 3 chain count as first double_crochet skip sts to reach the next 2ch gap make 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3dc in 2ch-gap of last round chain skip sts double_crochet in single double_crochet of last round chain skip sts as repeat all around join with 3rd beginning chain many rnds as you like change to accent color to make a decorative edge single_crochet in each st around whenever you reach a 2ch-gap make a single_crochet in 1st chain then make a picot and single_crochet in 2nd chain fo and sew the yarn tails at the back of the dress make 35 chain on each side of the collar for tying together lace crown round 92 chain start in 6th stitch from the hook 1 double_crochet skip 2 sts double_crochet 3 chain double_crochet in the next st x 17 skip the remaining chain 2 3 chain 5 double_crochet in 1st v-stitches of last round single_crochet in next gap 6 double_crochet in next v-st x 16 fo sew yarn ends insert yarn on other side make 35 chain for binding on the head of your doll for the 1st round we re crocheting double_crochet 3ch double_crochet in the same st then skip 2 sts and again double_crochet 3ch double_crochet skip 2 sts etc… the double_crochet 3ch double_crochet creates v-stitches v-stitches for the 2nd row we make the double_crochet stitches into the v-sts of last round then single_crochet in the next st etc
